data.mode: Forecast mode for the Weather entity
data.name: Integration Name
data.units: Units for sensors. Only used for if sensors are requested.
data.twicedaily_forecast: Twice Daily forecast sensors in csv form from 0-1 (ex. '0,1'). Only used if sensors are requested.
data.monitored_conditions: Monitored conditions to create sensors for. Only used if sensors are requested.
data.nws_platform: Weather Entity and/or Sensor Entity. Sensor will create entities for each condition at each time. If unsure, only select Weather!
data.scan_interval: Seconds to wait between updates. Reducing this below 1800 seconds (30 minutes) is not recommended.

data.station: NWS Weather Station ID (Typically the nearest NWS airport code, eg: CLE)
data.grid: NWS Grid Identifier (Two digits separated by a comma, eg: 77,63)
